instructions.2: Pour milk into a small bowl. Sprinkle gelatin powder over milk and stir until combined. Set aside.
instructions.3: Stir heavy cream and sugar together in a saucepan. Set over medium heat and bring to a boil; watch carefully as the cream can quickly bubble up and boil over.
instructions.4: Immediately stir gelatin mixture into boiling cream, stirring until completely dissolved. Cook and stir for 1 minute.
instructions.5: Remove the pan from the heat and stir in vanilla.
instructions.6: Pour cream mixture into 6 individual ramekins. Leave to cool, uncovered, until no longer warm, about 20 minutes.
instructions.7: When cool, cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate until set, at least 4 hours but preferably overnight.

questions.question: Is gelatin mixture from Step 4 still available in Step 7?
Is gelatin powder live after Step 5?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 7?
Can we pour (Step 2) and stir (Step 3) at the same time?
